reviews.text: floral aroma. beautiful translucent ruby color. Floral aroma comes out in the taste, am new to tasting/rating. Had one buy itâs self and then one with steak and wedges of cheese.

Available only on tap, I understand it may be a seasonal offering. Itâs dark-amber in colour. A thin but creamy cap of light tan foam tops it but dissipates shortly. Still, it maintains a wide collar and whispy surface covering, and leaves some splotchy and spotty lace behind.Coffee leaps out at you in the aroma!!! Itâs rich and bright.In the mouth itâs smooth with a medium body; moderate, perhaps even restrained, carbonation; and slight oiliness from the coffee.As in the nose, coffee flavor dominates, rich and wide, but also interacting with the malt and hop flavors.

Taste like beer infused with vodka. Reminds me of my village brew and to double potency we poured distilled whisky into the grain brew (Busaa infused with changâaa). Very strong but not one to drink/ enjoy the whole night.
